alert.note: Alert for Southern Nassau (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued October 30 at 3:21AM EDT until October 30 at 12:00PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM THIS MORNING TO NOON EDT TODAY... * WHAT...One to two feet of inundation above ground level expected in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline. * WHERE...Southern Nassau County. * WHEN...From 8 AM this morning to noon EDT today. * IMPACTS...Widespread minor to locally moderate flooding of vulnerable areas is expected near the waterfront and shoreline, including roads, parking lots, parks, lawns, and homes and businesses with basements near the waterfront. Some road closures may be likely, and vehicles parked in vulnerable areas near the waterfront could become flooded. Flooding may also extend inland from the waterfront along tidal rivers and bays. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Minor flooding is also likely with the morning high tide cycles on Tuesday and Wednesday. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. EAST ROCKAWAY INLET AT ATLANTIC BEACH NY MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 6.2 FT, MODERATE 7.2 FT, MAJOR 8.2 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.3 FT, MODERATE 2.3 FT, MAJOR 3.3 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 30/09 AM 6.7/ 7.2 1.8/ 2.2 1.0/ 1.5 2 MINOR 30/09 PM 4.7/ 5.2 -0.2/ 0.3 0.4/ 0.9 2 NONE 31/10 AM 6.1/ 6.6 1.2/ 1.7 0.6/ 1.1 2 MINOR 31/10 PM 5.2/ 5.7 0.2/ 0.8 0.9/ 1.4 1 NONE 01/11 AM 6.2/ 6.7 1.3/ 1.8 1.0/ 1.5 2 MINOR 01/11 PM 4.7/ 5.2 -0.2/ 0.2 0.7/ 1.1 2 NONE REYNOLDS CHANNEL AT POINT LOOKOUT NY MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 6.0 FT, MODERATE 7.0 FT, MAJOR 8.0 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.3 FT, MODERATE 2.3 FT, MAJOR 3.3 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 30/09 AM 6.8/ 7.3 2.1/ 2.6 1.4/ 1.9 3 MODERATE 30/09 PM 4.7/ 5.2 0.1/ 0.6 0.8/ 1.3 3 NONE 31/10 AM 6.1/ 6.6 1.4/ 1.9 0.9/ 1.4 2 MINOR 31/10 PM 5.2/ 5.7 0.5/ 1.0 1.2/ 1.7 1-2 NONE 01/11 AM 6.2/ 6.7 1.5/ 2.0 1.3/ 1.8 2 MINOR 01/11 PM 4.7/ 5.2 0.1/ 0.6 1.0/ 1.5 3 NONE HUDSON BAY AT FREEPORT NY MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 6.0 FT, MODERATE 6.5 FT, MAJOR 7.2 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.5 FT, MODERATE 2.0 FT, MAJOR 2.7 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 30/10 AM 6.4/ 6.9 1.9/ 2.3 2.5/ 3.0 1 MODERATE 30/10 PM 5.2/ 5.7 0.7/ 1.1 2.0/ 2.5 1-2 NONE 31/10 AM 5.7/ 6.2 1.3/ 1.8 2.2/ 2.7 0 MINOR 31/11 PM 5.4/ 5.9 0.9/ 1.4 2.3/ 2.8 0 NONE 01/11 AM 6.0/ 6.5 1.5/ 2.0 2.5/ 3.0 0 MINOR 02/12 AM 5.0/ 5.5 0.5/ 1.0 2.2/ 2.7 0 NONE &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
